title: Tabs in Summoner Profile [STATS - maps]  Upgrade delays (missing data)
body:
In a Participant's Profile screen, an upgrade has not fully completed.  
Riot, pls tell us what to expect and when.  
The new mods appear better presented.  Cannot further criticize constructively until more info available.

replies.body:
It appears you are talking about Alpha client? Only the bare bones profile has been implemented so far (the Overview tab). [Alpha discussion should all go on the Alpha board.](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client) There will usually be news posts when new features are coming to the alpha client.

Do let me know if I'm mistaken.
